name: afk
description: Set your AFK status.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason you are going AFK

detailedDescription:
Set your AFK (Away From Keyboard) status. This will notify others when they mention you.

Options:
- reason (Optional): Specify why you're going AFK. If not provided, it will default to 'AFK'.

name: av
description: Displays the avatar of the specified user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose avatar you want to display

detailedDescription:
Display the avatar of a user in high resolution.

Options:
- user (Optional): The user whose avatar you want to see. If not specified, it shows your own avatar.

name: bridge
description: Displays the profile of another server using a stored profile ID.

options.name: profile_id
options.description: The ID of the server profile you want to display.

detailedDescription:
View the profile of another server using its unique profile ID.

Options:
- profile_id (Required): The unique identifier of the server profile you want to display. This ID is typically set by server administrators.

name: clearlvlroles
description: Clears all level-role associations in this guild.
detailedDescription:
Remove all associations between levels and roles in the current server. This will not delete the roles themselves, only their connection to specific levels.

Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.

name: deletejoinrole
description: Removes the default join role for new members.
detailedDescription:
Remove the role that is automatically assigned to new members when they join the server.

Requires the 'Manage Roles' permission.

name: displayserver
description: Manage and display server statistics.

options.name: action
options.description: Action to perform

options.name: field
options.description: Field to update or remove

options.name: value
options.description: New value for the field

examples: /displayserver action: update field: description value: Welcome to our server!
detailedDescription:
Manage and display server statistics.

Actions:
- display: Show current server profile
- update: Modify a field in the server profile
- remove: Delete a field from the server profile
- setid: Set a custom ID for the server profile (Premium feature)

Fields (for update/remove):
- name: Server name
- description: Server description
- icon_url: URL of the server icon
- banner_url: URL of the server banner
- invite_url: Invite link for the server
- member_count: Number of members (auto-updated)
- online_count: Number of online members (auto-updated)
- creation_date: Server creation date (auto-set)
- owner: Server owner (auto-set)
- custom_field1: User-defined field
- custom_field2: User-defined field
- custom_field3: User-defined field

Note: Some fields are automatically managed and cannot be manually updated.

name: help
description: Get help and information about the bot.
detailedDescription: Display helpful information about the bot, including links to the command list, premium features, FAQ, and the bot's homepage.

name: hug
description: Give someone a hug!

options.name: target
options.description: The user you want to hug

detailedDescription:
Send a virtual hug to someone or to the entire server.

Options:
- target (Optional): The user you want to hug. If not specified, you'll hug the entire server.

name: jail
description: Jails or unjails a user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to jail or unjail

detailedDescription:
Jail or unjail a user. When jailed, the user loses all roles and is given a 'Jailed' role, restricting their access.

Options:
- user (Required): The user to jail or unjail.

Requires 'Manage Roles' and 'Move Members' permissions.

name: level
description: Check a user's level and XP progress.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to check the level for (optional).

detailedDescription:
Display the current level and XP progress of a user.

Options:
- user (Optional): The user whose level you want to check. If not specified, it shows your own level.

name: lvlroles
description: Displays all roles and their associated levels within the server.
detailedDescription: Show a list of all roles that are automatically assigned when users reach specific levels in the server.

name: purge
description: Deletes a specified number of messages from the current channel, optionally from specific users.

options.name: amount
options.description: The number of messages to delete (up to 10000).

options.name: users
options.description: Mention users to delete messages from (optional).

detailedDescription:
Delete a specified number of messages from the current channel.

Options:
- amount (Required): The number of messages to delete (1-10000).
- users (Optional): Mention specific users to delete messages only from them.

Requires the 'Manage Messages' permission.
Note: Messages older than 14 days cannot be bulk deleted.

name: removeprefix
description: Remove the custom prefix and revert to slash commands only.
detailedDescription:
Remove the custom prefix and revert to slash commands only. This will disable all text-based commands and require users to use slash commands exclusively.

Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.

name: serverinfo
description: Displays info about the current server.
detailedDescription: Show detailed information about the current server, including member count, creation date, and other relevant statistics.

name: setjail
description: Sets or creates the jail channel and role.

options.name: channel
options.description: The jail channel (optional)

options.name: role
options.description: The jail role (optional)

detailedDescription:
Set up or modify the jail system for the server.

Options:
- channel (Optional): The channel to use as the jail. If not specified, a new channel will be created.
- role (Optional): The role to assign to jailed users. If not specified, a new role will be created.

Requires 'Manage Channels' and 'Manage Roles' permissions.

name: setjoinrole
description: Sets the default join role for new members.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to assign to new members

detailedDescription:
Set a role to be automatically assigned to new members when they join the server.

Options:
- role (Required): The role to assign to new members.

Requires the 'Manage Roles' permission.

name: setlvlrole
description: Sets a role to be assigned when a user reaches a specific level.

options.name: level
options.description: The level to associate with a role

options.name: role
options.description: The role to assign at the specified level

detailedDescription:
Associate a role with a specific user level. The role will be automatically assigned when a user reaches that level.

Options:
- level (Required): The level at which to assign the role (minimum 1).
- role (Required): The role to assign at the specified level.

Requires the 'Manage Roles' permission.

name: setprefix
description: Set a custom prefix for text commands

options.name: prefix
options.description: The new prefix to use

detailedDescription:
Set a custom prefix for text commands in the server.

Options:
- prefix (Required): The new prefix to use for text commands. Must be 5 characters or less.

Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.

name: kiss
description: Give someone a kiss!

options.name: target
options.description: The user you want to kiss

detailedDescription:
Send a virtual kiss to someone or to the entire server.

Options:
- target (Optional): The user you want to kiss. If not specified, you'll kiss the entire server.

name: jail
description: Jails or unjails a user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to jail or unjail

detailedDescription:
Jail or unjail a user. When jailed, the user loses all roles and is given a 'Jailed' role, restricting their access. When unjailed, their previous roles are restored.

Options:
- user (Required): The user to jail or unjail.

Note: Requires 'Manage Roles' and 'Move Members' permissions. The jail channel and role must be set up using the /setjail command first.

name: level
description: Check a user's level and XP progress.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to check the level for (optional).

detailedDescription:
Display the level and XP progress of a user.

Options:
- user (Optional): The user to check the level for. If not specified, it shows your own level.

The command shows the current level, XP progress, and a visual progress bar towards the next level.

name: leaderboard
description: Displays The Top 10 Highest-Level Users in this server.
detailedDescription: Show the top 10 users with the highest levels in the server. The leaderboard displays each user's rank, mention, and current level.

name: lvlroles
description: Displays all roles and their associated levels within the server.
detailedDescription: Show all roles that are automatically assigned when users reach specific levels. This command displays a list of levels and their corresponding roles, including role IDs for reference.

name: purge
description: Deletes a specified number of messages from the current channel, optionally from specific users.

options.name: amount
options.description: The number of messages to delete (up to 10000).

options.name: users
options.description: Mention users to delete messages from (optional).

detailedDescription:
Delete a specified number of messages from the current channel.

Options:
- amount (Required): The number of messages to delete (1-10000).
- users (Optional): Mention specific users to delete messages only from them.

Requires the 'Manage Messages' permission.
Note: Messages older than 14 days cannot be bulk deleted due to Discord limitations.

name: removeprefix
description: Remove the custom prefix and revert to slash commands only.
detailedDescription:
Remove the custom text command prefix for the server, reverting to slash commands only. This will disable all text-based commands and require users to use slash commands exclusively.

Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.

name: serverinfo
description: Displays info about the current server.
detailedDescription:
Show detailed information about the current server, including:
- Server name and ID
- Owner
- Creation date
- Member count (total and online)
- Channel count
- Role count
- Server boost level
- Custom server information (if set up using /displayserver)

name: setjail
description: Sets or creates the jail channel and role.

options.name: channel
options.description: The jail channel (optional)

options.name: role
options.description: The jail role (optional)

detailedDescription:
Set up or modify the jail system for the server.

Options:
- channel (Optional): The channel to use as the jail. If not specified, a new channel will be created.
- role (Optional): The role to assign to jailed users. If not specified, a new role will be created.

If no options are provided, the command will create both a new channel and role.
Requires 'Manage Channels' and 'Manage Roles' permissions.

name: setjoinrole
description: Sets the default join role for new members.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to assign to new members

detailedDescription:
Set a role to be automatically assigned to new members when they join the server.

Options:
- role (Required): The role to assign to new members.

Requires the 'Manage Roles' permission.
Note: Ensure the bot has a role higher than the assigned role in the role hierarchy.

name: setlvlrole
description: Sets a role to be assigned when a user reaches a specific level.

options.name: level
options.description: The level to associate with a role

options.name: role
options.description: The role to assign at the specified level

detailedDescription:
Associate a role with a specific user level. The role will be automatically assigned when a user reaches that level.

Options:
- level (Required): The level at which to assign the role (minimum 1).
- role (Required): The role to assign at the specified level.

Requires the 'Manage Roles' permission.
Note: Ensure the bot has a role higher than the assigned role in the role hierarchy.

name: setprefix
description: Set a custom prefix for text commands

options.name: prefix
options.description: The new prefix to use

detailedDescription:
Set a custom prefix for text commands in the server.

Options:
- prefix (Required): The new prefix to use for text commands. Must be 5 characters or less.

Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
Note: This enables text-based commands alongside slash commands.
